title: Cant install .. when downloading stops at 260mb left/86% of the download and the speed goes to 0 kbp
body:
I have seen many people with issue... i have tried everything.. repairing.. turning off firewall and deactivating all anti-virus softwares
 i am installing on a new toshiba laptop windows 8.1 ...
tried many times but the kbps will eventually dopr to 0 and nothing will happen 

plz help

replies.body: I'm getting the same issue, and no matter what I try I just cannot fix it. I've sent in a support ticket, and I'll post here what happened if I find a solution.
